code.s:
xy = new XYscope(this)
xy.canvas()
xy.textAlign(CENTER, CENTER);

xy2 = new XYscope(this, xy.outXY) // additive synth
code.dt:
xy.drawXY()
xy.limitPath()

xy.freq(50)
xy.clearWaves()
// draw stuff here

xy.buildWaves()
